schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts at lightning speed and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: At 9.30 p.m. a 44-year-old driver wanted to turn left with her VW coming from Merklingen onto Landesstraße 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: Here she overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: Hand and foot brake levers fly away during the collision
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker tried to avoid the car, but still grazed it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Due to the strip process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mentally, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiffness next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker nevertheless suffered an injury to the Beim and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a Corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvesters tested positive for the Corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the series examination, as reported by the district office of Dingolfing-Landau on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population", explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers only for insertion jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with about 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, it is a closed group of people."
np-coburg.de.105627.10: In the courtyard, infected persons were separated from uninfected employees and the area is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and SPD gave the state government co-responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting the control of the shelters of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infections have to spread and regional lockdowns have to be ordered", said Jürgen Mistol, parliamentary managing director of the Green Party.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a very similar view: "After the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control program for farms with harvesters", said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: From our point of view, the hygiene conditions in the workplace and living conditions in particular need to be closely controlled.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Underground station Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after Schubser
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a push and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday there was a dispute between two youth groups at the underground station Aidenbachstraße at around 4.15 p.m.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passerby alerted the police, who arrived with several patrols.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to an initial investigation, a man from Munich (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slid over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the 17-year-old's group helped the fallen man climb out of the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an incoming train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were again clashes between the two persons.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the crime scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to Police Inspectorate 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: According to a media report, however, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer calls for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) calls for extended data retention - instead of the planned ten weeks half a year.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Accordingly, Seehofer wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He considers it useful to make urgently needed adjustments to the law now, "the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision by the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes beforehand so that they could be applied immediately after a possible positive judgment, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesperson for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it could only be meaningful to examine whether legal adjustments were needed if the courts had decided.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already spoken out in favour of data retention in June.
bild.255016.1: NBA strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), basketball professional of the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarter in Disney World in Orlando / Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN, is back in Isloation, is being tested daily for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for visiting: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, "Sweet Lou", as he is called in the NBA, has already expressed his love for exactly these wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta) have the best wings in the city."
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA Williams has ordered a ten-day quarantine.
bild.255016.10: Thus, the Clippers star misses the first two official games after the test match phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to end the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the best 22 teams with training games are preparing for the season finale starting on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on the Corona situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) has already announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has startled authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvesters from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the Corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities now offer free Corona tests to the 3,300 residents of the municipality.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvesters had little contact with the local population, the district office so far assumes that the infections did not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has shown himself to be cooperative", lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense attorney added: "He very much regrets the deeds, the confession was a liberation for him."
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and very much taken away by the extent of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: If convicted, according to the prosecutor's office, the man faces ten years imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic St. Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was badly damaged in a fire during the night to Saturday last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire broke out in three places far apart in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The now imprisoned suspect had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: He was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly became the focus of attention of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended that we consider the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli", Grindel told the "Bild am Sonntag."
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous to Bavaria and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules do not work anyway: See Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, one cannot avoid the debate as to whether it is not necessary to make it easier for associations that want to break into this phalanx to involve investors. "
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts as to whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority shareholdings, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to pull investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European internal market", said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more excitement in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV funds will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: FC Bayern generates a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: So the differences are already immense among the first three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million", explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and pierced the press instead of addressing me about it", said Grindel about the acceptance of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the conclusions from it", said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and unsuspectingly.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many people in the DFB knew about it.
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift", assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naive, but this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: The protests against police violence in the United States have been exacerbated by Donald Trump's deployment of federal police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday there were clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a march was just crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, there had been clashes again in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including officers from the Federal Police, used tear gas on Saturday night and forcibly drove demonstrators apart.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of demonstrators, partly armed, marched through Louisville in Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead during a drug raid at her home in Louisville in March.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: When a member of a group that describes itself as an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot on Saturday, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, there was no clash between the two groups.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, one person was shot and died during a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police said they took a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet provided any further information on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: According to the New York Times, Mayor Steve Adler said that, like many in the city, he was "inconsolable and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Demonstrators also clashed with the police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to trailers in front of a juvenile prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assault.
faz.79601.23: A courthouse was set on fire in the city of Oakland, California.
faz.79601.24: A small group of demonstrators smashed windows, shot down fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was taken to hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big show in the spa town was missing, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: The Rakoczy weekend without Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale burns, Rakoczy ball or parade, many got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading the Rakoczy flair", says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when the historical ones alone were the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy Festival for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: This is also the case this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple have made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watching the historical ones stroll and listening to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it quite pleasant", says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She doesn't miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, especially Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historic parade and the final fireworks display on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year", she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy equestrian tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who takes part in the parade in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she was walking in the city on Saturdays and Sundays in costume.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's more exhausting, otherwise we'll have it easier", she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, even if individual riders were traveling in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille will take place again next year", says the chairwoman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy equestrian tournament will take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases with Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division football club CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into the crisis due to a Corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to the city of A Coruña for a match on July 20, despite the first Corona cases, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, one was hospitalized, according to the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name southwest of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B group of the Second League is threatening.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was cancelled at the last moment, the prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, the top sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel or gel", wrote the sports newspaper "AS."
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung up underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry, after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: Also, the bed linen was not changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS."
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said that they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, rejected the accusation of intentionally endangering public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: They did not violate the Corona rules laid down by the football association, stressed the son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, as reported by the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca."
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there were four people infected by July 19, but all of them were isolated and did not travel with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Right before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, "five or six" other team members of the Corona test were positive.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was cancelled 60 minutes before the kick-off, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police have to catch horses torn out at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police took her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 o'clock a road user informed two freewheeling horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf / Steinsfeld and the motorway junction Theres.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officials arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the trust of the horses could be gained by the officials shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope carried in the patrol car put on.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - Seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently staking out the framework conditions with the team, how and in what form it could continue", the 35-year-old told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung."
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or other problems that would plague him as a family man, said Martin.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall and the first thought was: "Quickly back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: "What if."
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist acknowledged that there are definitely aspects with which he is increasingly struggling.
azonline.de.86610.11: But it was good for me to realize from the Corona time what I have about cycling and how much fun I enjoy it.
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to the competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour by motorcycle ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several mostly young people died in accidents on Bavaria's roads over the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit by a car in the opposite lane near Schönthal (Cham district) on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria on Saturday, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his plane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn he hit the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, according to the police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road on Sunday night and was rolled over by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could not brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: Near Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district) on Saturday a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on into a car in a right turn despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock and the remaining three people in the car were uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Minister of Transport Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organiser of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underrun protection on guardrails and the defusing of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "We have achieved a great deal for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years", the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: The number of motorized cyclists killed decreased by around 28 percent compared to 2011.
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - For football coach Niko Kovac there will soon be a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will be a guest on August 1 (6 p.m.) at the Hessen, the former club of the Croatian.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club it is the first and only endurance test before the return leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Because of the coronavirus pandemic, the encounter is held without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: We are particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends", explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: In sporting terms, this is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before joining FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hesse from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB-Pokal.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with regard to the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurt residents, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again", said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurt team lost the round-of-16 first leg against Basel in their own stadium 3-0.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: Landkreis Hof just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new Corona infections has increased further over the weekend: From 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in these statistics) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: This brings the Hof area closer to the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 killed by monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people are affected by the severe flooding in Southeast Asia, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: Due to the heavy monsoon rain, a total of 700 people were killed.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.

euronews-de.199228.8: In the Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 tank rhinos died from landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are under protection and are considered to be endangered by extinction.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly bad, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the village of Cox's Bazar in the south of Bangladesh, the state has built apartments for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It's difficult to bring people to Cox's Bazar.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm also persists in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small it was and resembled a hut, often does not want to spend their lives in a large block of flats.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are empty, but - as the government wants it - will soon be occupied by those who have lost their homes due to the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: This would not only be irresponsible but also unfair, according to a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors.
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: That is why Argentina is asking its private creditors to waive some of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is once again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders had called for higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is experiencing a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate has recently been more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: Experts expect economic power to decline by around ten percent for the current year.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had not settled interest claims amounting to 503 million US dollars and had thus slipped into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.1: Arrived professionally - not yet in private
pnp.de.390078.2: "It's going super well" - this is the conclusion drawn by Dr. Stefanie Kramer after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she will succeed Lutz Feller at the Eggenfelden notary office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the lawyer with a doctorate in law started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: "However, I still have to arrive", she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to relocate the centre of life from Regensburg completely to Eggenfelden, reports the native Dingolfinger.
pnp.de.390078.7: Currently, she and her husband, who works as a judge at the district court in Regensburg, are looking for a suitable apartment or a house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to ensure the care of the two daughters (3 1⁄2 and 1 1⁄2 years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute every day from Regensburg, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighbouring district, the city of Eggenfelden has of course been known to her for a long time.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits on site with her family in recent months, she noticed again: "Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town."
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she made the race in the selection process for the vacancy.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her native Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal traineeship and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, among others in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in the Lower Allgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also "incidentally" shouldered her doctorate in employment law - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016 she went on parental leave, followed by the move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representative services in various notary offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for full career re-entry, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday representation at the notary's office in the future, has completely taken over Dr. Stefanie Kramer - and immediately has praise for the firm's team: "It's going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private centre of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: When it comes to kindergarten and nursery places, she has already contacted a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything works out as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging tracks in the Rottal valley.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent filled at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: Due to the distance control, which is mandatory to comply with, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators, Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the "Tagesspiegel."
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds just over 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games caused by the Corona pandemic last season, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: The Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal audience seats, some of the approximately 4000 seats in the hospitality area can be opened again: "It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues break away completely."
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing Corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable side length."
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are in short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited", explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The head of marketing in Dortmund praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should help to overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work."
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start to life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Barely heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: That was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of about 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Graz Children's Hospital.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with less than one kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that they could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll's clothes and mini diapers specially made for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't be in voice - "and how", smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: Even if of course they don't scream as loudly as big babies.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom, the 9th grades of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd experienced the whiteboard as a stage shortly before the start of the holiday.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "The Home Dress" to the pupils - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to exchange ideas about the play and the performance via Skype with the actress and the director Winfried Tobias.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format from the current Corona situation was born.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was happy about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if all participants agreed at the end that the direct encounter in the theatre and stage space would offer additional stimuli, the theatre also sees the potential for contact with the schools.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we further improve the technical framework, this could be an interesting addition to the game operation", said director Winfried Tobias.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.1: First round drawn: TSV 1860 would face Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB-Pokal
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: Should TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB-Pokal, the Lions will face Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This resulted in the draw on Sunday.

abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.5: The Lions would face Eintracht Frankfurt in a successful qualification.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.6: This was the result of the draw on Sunday evening at the ARD-Sportschau.
