mz-web.de.376296.1: Gone with the Wind: Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theatre man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia of Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night' s Dream."
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and brought her out big alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the Heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the lead role of "To Each His Own."
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was shown in Germany under the title "Mother's Heart."
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later, the award for Best Actress came in William Wyler's "The Heiress" (The Heiress).
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit."
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier suggested her in 1952 for the lead role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel."
mz-web.de.376296.14: The piece was a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: She played with her longtime boyfriend Bette Davis in "Lullaby for a Corpse."
mz-web.de.376296.16: The son Benjamin emerged from his marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953).
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had his daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: However, rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath have never been confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole / Wickler miss final on comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: The World Cup second Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final at the beach volleyball tournament "Road to Timmendorf."
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Düsseldorf they lost in the semi-finals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen with 1: 2 (17: 21, 21: 17, 19: 21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Most recently, Thole / Wickler played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine their conquerors Ehlers / Flüggen claimed a defeat against the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde with 0: 2 (17: 21, 17: 21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German championships were played at the beginning of September in Timmendorfer Strand: The tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger / Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms / Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner / Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz ejection from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "Feigenblatt"
paz-online.de.95211.2: From the point of view of the FDP, the expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the right-wing extremists in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD", the FDP domestic politician Benjamin Strasser told the news agency dpa in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: On Saturday in Stuttgart, after several hours of hearing, the Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD confirmed the exclusion of Kalbitz, which was decided by a majority of the federal executive board in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD were really interested in consistently removing right-wing extremists from their party, officials such as Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been expelled long ago", said Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will for this in the AfD, because right-wing extremism now belongs to the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume commented similarly: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded does not say anything and does not change anything", he told the "Welt am Sonntag."
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Rather, it speaks volumes about how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist still has in the middle of the AfD."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will again end up below five percent in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered."
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Björn Höcke; the Protection of the Constitution classifies the coronation as "assured right-wing extremist aspiration."
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive had thrown Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason he stated that Kalbitz did not specify an earlier membership in the now banned far-right "Heimattreuen Deutsche Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the left parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, whether with or without Kalbitz.
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing will be weakened with this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: The manoeuvre of the Meuthen troupe is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar", said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: The AfD will not get rid of the ghosts it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion does not change anything, "commented the Brandenburg SPD general secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here the AfD state association and the faction held to their right-wing leader to this day."
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms supply a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period last year, said the network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: TenneT is responsible for transmitting North Sea electricity to the mainland and transmitting it through the German electricity grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which do not belong to Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North Sea and Baltic Sea comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of the total wind power in Germany, which is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities, because new wind farms have been connected to the grid over the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is expected to rise to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections", said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, even at sea, wind farms cannot exploit their capacity, but reach about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply nearly seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: This was almost a small anniversary celebration for the 130th anniversary.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The opening of the exhibition "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold went beyond the usual scope after the Corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery the association "Sandtogether" was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windberg Festival will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned in September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - knowing how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute", explained Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-party).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: But ultimately, as an organizer, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people.
dnn-online.de.39567.7: Because if tens of thousands had flocked to the festival grounds and the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current Coronaschutz regulation could not have been complied with.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so strong that there would not have been much left of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organizational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times over.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital will celebrate its 100th anniversary with the Winterberg Festival from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Olympic dressage champion Werth in Achleiten not to be beaten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg scored four victories in four starts over the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix at the start with Weihegold and Quantaz, she was also unbeatable on Sunday in the Grand Prix Special and in the freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold Werth clearly prevailed on Sunday in the special against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: The German was also clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer in the freestyle on Saturday on Quantaz.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: It was Quantaz's first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all important four tests at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for August 14-16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Applied Sciences in Worms goes further into the air: The "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" donates a professorship for "Air Traffic Management."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: The professorship makes it possible to start studies not only in the summer semester but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and the DFS Air Traffic Control Academy will be utilized evenly.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on setting up and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester 2019, the first students have been in the Air Traffic Management program as part of their training as an air traffic controller at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, DFS's experience has been very positive and the students' achievements are excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training contributes significantly to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: In these times, promotion is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to continue to fulfil our statutory mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel", says Professor Klaus-Dieter SCHEURLE, Chairman of DFS at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We therefore continue our good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpin our attractiveness as an employer. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree program in Air Traffic Management. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of German air traffic control is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research expertise in the future fields of aviation.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: Working for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative priorities for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary at the Ministry of Science, Continuing Education and Culture, emphasizes: "With its focus on aviation, Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the profile of the university.
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue helicopter lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: The A 45 motorway was fully closed for about 30 minutes on Saturday afternoon in the direction of Aschaffenburg, as the rescue helicopter was in operation after a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old drove a Ford at about 12.40 o'clock in the exit Alzenau-Mitte straight ahead in the curve and landed at the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The impact triggered the front airbags and the driver suffered minor injuries to his face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries of the 72-year-old passenger were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown by rescue helicopter to a hospital.
main-netz.de.61826.6: Currently, however, the police assume that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, which caused damage of about 2000 euros, had to be towed.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to test other industries after the meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The Corona crisis brought the conditions in parts of the meat industry to light again.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.3: Tightening of the law is imminent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they right - and will it stick to it?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Labour Minister Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to review other industries in accordance with the now planned strict regulations against grievances in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at the industry by industry and then take suitable measures for the respective industry if necessary", Heil told the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: Following the mass Corona outbreak at the meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to deploy external personnel for slaughter, disassembly and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: To this end, the use of work contracts and temporary workers there is to be prohibited.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer president Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Hands off a general restriction of work contracts and employee assignment, if you do not want to completely strangle the economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Work contracts, for example, are the basis for their added value to the customer for large areas of crafts, construction and plant engineering.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The failures of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban works contracts everywhere in the German economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "If an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a safety system, this is a normal work contract."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on works contracts and temporary work in its industry alone to be unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It cannot be explained why different labour law should apply to portioning and packaging cheese in the future than to sausages, according to a statement on the bill, as reported by the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: In the event of a ban, the consumer price would rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Health and Safety Administration, many Eastern European employees from contract companies worked in the industry 16 hours a day.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were retained for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation with the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively sharp law for the meat industry had already come into force in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these have been circumvented by "tricky constructions."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now it has to be fundamentally cleaned up."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "In the Occupational Health and Safety Act, which we want to adopt in the cabinet at the end of July, there are also measures that do not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher test rates for occupational health and safety or clear criteria for community accommodation."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented to dpa includes amendments to the law on safeguarding workers' rights in the meat industry and the Occupational Health and Safety Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Green Party) believes that more intensive controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to make even more checks in many supervisory areas: Food inspections, animal welfare, all sorts of things, such as animal transport", said Nonnemacher on Sunday on the RBB programme "Brandenburg aktuell."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: But more staff positions are also needed for more checks.
tt.com.148707.1: Three killed in ultralight crash in Germany
tt.com.148707.2: According to the police, three people died when an ultralight plane crashed into an apartment building in Wesel in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia.
tt.com.148707.4: Two other people were rescued injured in the accident, said a spokesman for the Wesel district control centre.
tt.com.148707.5: A parachute was found at the scene of the accident, according to the police.
tt.com.148707.6: The "Rheinische Post" reported, citing eyewitnesses, that the plane collided with a hot air balloon before the crash.
tt.com.148707.7: The house is a one- or two-family house.
tt.com.148707.8: Further details were not disclosed at first.
rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Eviction of Frankfurt Opera Square proceeded peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: One week after the riots in Frankfurt, the eviction of the opera square during the night to Sunday was also peaceful.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: Most recently, a few dozen people stayed on the square, but left it before the curfew began at 1 a.m.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been deployed with numerous officers since the early evening, and a larger police force could be seen throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend, from midnight, there was a ban on entering the Opera Square, where there were riots a week ago.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Policemen had been attacked with bottles from the crowd of revellers.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: At least five officers were injured and several police vehicles were damaged.
rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The night to Saturday had also remained quiet.
hna.de.247362.1: Car overturns: Young woman seriously injured in accident on federal highway 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: A 21-year-old suffered serious injuries in an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme on Sunday at around 1.25 p.m.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to the Klinikum Kassel.
hna.de.247362.4: With thermal imaging cameras, the fire department was looking for possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was on the federal highway 83 in the direction of her home town of Hümme, when her car came off the road for a hitherto unknown reason and flipped over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the victims, the fire department had to cut the roof of the car.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, was also ordered for the search for persons.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the volunteers did not find anyone between the tall corn plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured man was taken by ambulance to the Kassel hospital for further care.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 emergency personnel from the fire department Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The federal highway was closed for two hours due to the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redeeming goal from Cristiano Ronaldo, record champion Juventus has secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer made the 36th Scudetto in the club's history perfect with a 2: 0 (1: 0) on Sunday evening in the home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which competed without the last long-injured ex-national player Sami Khedira, can no longer be displaced from first place two match days before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Second place Inter Milan is seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus was harmless despite optical superiority in the first half, then Ronaldo scored after a free-kick variant with the last action.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old recycled a game by Miralem Pjanic directly from the boundary of the penalty area with a flat shot (45. + 7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the now more offensive guests Ronaldo was also involved in the 2-0, after his shot Federico Bernardeschi (67th) dusted off.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lacklustre but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The foulelfmeter shot to the bar in the 89th minute should have only reallyed Ronaldo himself with regard to the goalscoring classification.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: It's complicated to stay at ball height mentally and physically for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange and the momentum changes very slightly", explained coach Maurizio Sarri after the 1: 2 at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Especially the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Because of the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to make the championship perfect.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: Juve's reassuring lead at the top of the table was mainly due to the weakness of its competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: Because in the eleven games before Sunday's game, the Sarri team managed only five wins.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also be the top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, the former Dortmund Ciro Immobile has already scored 34 goals after his three-pack in the 5: 1 (1: 1) of fourth place Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed to the title win of FC Bayern.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by the current Juve professional Gonzalo Higuaín.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015 / 2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: In August the next title chance awaits the "Old Lady" of Italian football.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the round of 16 of the Champions League, but have to make up for a 0-1 first leg loss against Olympique Lyon on August 7 to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round, Real Madrid or Manchester City would wait as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all threatened penalties and court rulings, motorists continue to accelerate in countless illegal races on the roads of Baden-Württemberg: Last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparative figures for the years before, but the racers are increasingly doing work for the judicial authorities: In 2018, the public prosecutor's offices between Konstanz and Mannheim conducted a total of 155 investigations for illegal races, a year later there were already 252 and in the current year until the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, according to the response of the Ministry of the Interior to an inquiry from the state parliament SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or they escaped from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the racers caught and asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed and 15 prison sentences have been issued since 2018.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other drivers reacted more sensitively than before because of the numerous tragic accidents and trials of past years and reported more frequently, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The motorway 8 is particularly popular with racers. Again and again, drivers slow down the traffic there in order to gain space and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.13: A81 is the most popular "race track"
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: On the A81, the police register even more races than on any other federal motorway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit, an attempt is made to slow down the racers on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped-up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates because the drivers switch to the grass in Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighbouring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few distances: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometres per hour, we would tackle this problem on motorways", says Martin Rivoir, the transport expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for racers would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there with 200 kilometres per hour and more."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of enlightenment or image campaigns: "Anyone who overrides all rules in such a way and puts not only their own lives but also the lives of other road users at risk, is hardly achievable with reason."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: On the other hand, this is not enough for the ADAC: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits", says Holger Bach, Head of Transport and Environment at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: It calls for additional and tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed test of strength turns into painful and consequential seriousness: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people across the country have died in the races, two of them uninvolved in a nightly crash in downtown Stuttgart and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have engaged in a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and remained lying on its side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: According to Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, however, tougher penalties are not necessary: "The need for legislative action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races harder is not seen", says the paper of the Ministry of the Interior.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light from July 23: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in the valley road at around 3.40 a.m. and ran towards the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man serving himself with drinks at the refrigerator and then leaving the snack bar through a previously smashed entrance door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled in the direction of the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also used a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In fact, he was wearing a black hoodie, black trousers and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Further witness information will be received by the police.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann won his second day victory on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatinate rider from Team Bora-Hansgrohe prevailed in the mass sprint on the 109-kilometre section with start and finish in Sibiu, having already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the season wins three and four for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: His Austrian team mate Gregor Mühlberger prevailed in the overall classification.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had confidently won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders competed for the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No fewer than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the season restart with a win", Ackermann explained after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic", said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: 300 meters before the finish he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked out perfectly."
pnp.de.390142.12: According to the rules of the world governing body UCI, a Corona test was carried out for all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and supervisors in isolated hygiene bubbles were separated from the organisation team and the media.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire department, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: "A control center disponent immediately gave instructions for lay resuscitation", a fire department spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue workers took over the resuscitation measures shortly afterwards.
bild.254818.7: The child in danger of his life was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started an investigation into the cause of the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire department spokesman: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment."
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning meeting - Police intervene 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and temporarily over 1000 people participated Saturday night in a "tuning meeting" in the parking lot of a furniture store.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to increasingly control such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A big tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (July 25, 2020) in Nuremberg's southern city.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, the Nuremberg traffic police detected an increased volume of vehicles in the area of a large parking lot in Ingolstädter Straße at around 10.30 p.m.
infranken.de.309656.7: As a result, the police carried out a large number of vehicle checks there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently the police announced that they wanted to step up action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers counted at the top about 700 vehicles and about 1100 people, according to the police.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small proportion of those present can be assigned to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the police's appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: Based on the vehicles and persons on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the vast majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular compliance with the minimum distance and wearing mouth and nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The on-site inspection measures were completed at around 1: 00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials noticed such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters of Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on the events and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers", it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The agency News5 spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the participating towing company: "They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them", says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this purpose.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must be careful not to cause any damage.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back unscathed."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Figures from the Employment Agency: 900 suspected cases of abuse during short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time worker benefits.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: This is extremely little for more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work, Daniel Terzenbach, CEO responsible for operations, told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When many companies suddenly applied for short-time work at the beginning of the Corona crisis, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the exam takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: So much time was not available to us in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be a lot more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have a long breath.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Evidence of abuse often comes from the affected employees or trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: BA also uses analysis software to detect patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we prepare ourselves in case and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8.48 p.m. by the district drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation announced on PNN request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the foundation there are repeated accumulations in which the distance and hygiene rules Covid 19 Contact Ordinance are not complied with.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with about 300 people in the park Babelsberg, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a corona regulation, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Storage on the meadows is prohibited according to the parking regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for a long time that visitors are leaving more and more rubbish and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached a different dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was dissolved by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after Corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: With hundreds of tests, authorities have reacted to a Corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: Accordingly, many of those infected are young interns in tourism businesses, but at least one holiday guest has tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodations on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations of bookings there and there, the head of the Wolfgangsee Tourist Board, Hans Wieser", told dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, about a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections became public.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: On Saturday, the head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behaviour of the interns, who had celebrated in several restaurants and may have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing that in our youth", he told the radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism association launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees about the dangers of Covid-19.
