braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak evokes memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which in the early stages of the pandemic was a centre of the Corona spread throughout Europe.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1,500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of new infections is on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualify for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - English football record champion Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year's absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the last day of the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) win over direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to settle for the Europa League, because Chelsea FC still passed by and also qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa was able to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90 + 8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponents of FC Bayern in the Champions League round of 16, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45 + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45 + 4).
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me", said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the final of the FA Cup against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's win over Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who passed the Wolves with a meagre 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace and started in sixth place in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble for class retention at West Ham United for a long time.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) immediately compensated Andrej Jarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: The 1: 1 (0: 0) was enough because Watford lost 2: 3 (1: 3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which scored three coaches during the season, is relegated after five first league years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, who couldn't save himself by a 3-1 (2-1) at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest score the Reds have ever achieved in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017 / 18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) shot the match for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: "It was an extraordinary season for this wonderful club", said goalscorer van Dijk after the game, which should encourage us to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses should also be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were suspended from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion about an early abandonment or the hosting of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence during demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly intense.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: On Sunday night in Jerusalem, the Israeli police took violent action against participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, said police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to break up the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns, and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration were also arrested, who supported Netanyahu, reported the news site "Ynet."
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police reports, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv because he was suspected of spraying pepper spray from a moving car on demonstrators on the side of the road.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a stabbing attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Most recently, Netanyahu was also criticized for his handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of hasty relaxation and a lack of preparation for a second Corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The Corona crisis has badly affected the country's economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently stood at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to ever new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes on car - nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision caused nine minor injuries on the B58 near Ahlen on Saturday afternoon.
bild.254850.3: A female driver was travelling with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Presumably she had suddenly braked because she wanted to turn."
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van who drove behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after Corona suspected case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a "brilliant success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country is reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official Corona suspected case in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a big city for fear of a disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defense measures in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country", the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been imposed for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership declared the highest alert level.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea has not yet registered a single infection and described its defensive measures as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly detected in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person left for South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea for the border crossing within the four-kilometre-wide and largely mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports from the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military acknowledged the possibility of crossing the border illegally into North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: There were investigations into some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea said it called an emergency meeting of the Workers' Party's Politburo, chaired by ruler Kim Jong Un, on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure to "completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and region from others."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned and all the people in Kaesong who had been in contact with her were quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party should therefore investigate the "outlier case" as well as the behaviour of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose harsh punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of Council meeting: City-East and noise protection are up for discussion before a big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the large-scale project inner city development East", it says rather casually in the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4.30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, the upgrading of the eastern city is controversial until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are narrow, most recently even negative in individual committees, depending on their presence.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed from the citizenry and then by the administration and the municipal council fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "clueless", "speculation", "vilification" and "deliberate false statements."
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better", says Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizen list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the contracts, he is in this position: "I know what I'm talking about."
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit will be cheaper for the city, contrary to statements of the city administration, the Technical Town Hall is to be renovated after grants, the existence of which Klein is convinced, for 8.5 million euros.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop very differently than is predicted in the town hall and on the part of business advocates.
pz-news.de.72354.10: To shape the city by its own strength and not an investor: This is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It also essentially envisages the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the keeping open of the Schloßberg, the rental of the ex-valley for administrative space and a smaller-scale transformation of the city centre, ideally with local carriers.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: Environmental issues will also play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health noise pollution caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local transport club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because by neglecting the regular bus traffic with thinned cycles and by little commitment to cycling, they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus the noise, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the Energy and Climate Protection Agency Pforzheim / Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: Also on the agenda is the accession to the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the redefinition of parental contributions in the municipal daycare centres and the application for inclusion in the federal government's smart city funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed Corona protection measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his premiere season in the ADAC GT Masters on July 31.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operations, the first test drives were scheduled.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: The Corona crisis has long prevented Tim Zimmermann from embarking on his first business trip in the new Lamborghini Huracan from Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old Langenargener made his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his premiere in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the pre-season", says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: With the ABS, for example, you have to go into the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun.
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite his only 25 years, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT sport and was able to help his new team-mate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series also brings new challenges", says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I understand each other brilliantly and we have made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Right there - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also host its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From July 31, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track", says Zimmermann, who starts for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally in order to be fast.
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is, it turns out in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play poker a little bit during the tests", he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: In the end, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring.
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a densely packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current state of affairs is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will reach into the GT steering wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine Spanish holidaymakers for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister cold, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Accordingly, Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising Corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry without quarantine requirements is possible.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to be quarantined after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the regulation applies to those who are just on vacation on the deadline, only from Saturday, August 1, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still regarded in Austria as one of the "safe countries" for which no quarantine is required in Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers may have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine will be imposed on holidaymakers in Spain", commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently nobody bothered to tell Grant Shapps."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the Corona emergency in Spain and the expiry of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists primarily blame the nightlife for the new spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of Britain's favourite holiday destinations.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is currently advising against unnecessary travel to mainland Spain, excluding the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: So far, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been recorded in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Naval Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: On the occasion of Navy Day in his country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced equipping the warships with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, which are unique in the world, would expand the fighting possibilities of the Russian naval forces, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defence also informed about successful tests of the zircon hypersonic missile built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo will continue to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: It will continue to be built on the atomically equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also drove a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service by the individual fleet units of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The Navy has been reliably protecting Russia for 300 years, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: Naval forces also celebrated Naval Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a arms show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video published by the Ministry of Defense showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help made more difficult due to Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - This year's first hurricane over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening flooding, strong winds and heavy rainfall now threatened parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center of the US Climate Agency NOAA announced during the night to Sunday (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The Corona pandemic, which is rampant in Texas, is making the work of the aid workers more difficult, Abbott said, according to the US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is an enormous challenge", said Abbott according to the newspaper "Houston Chronicle."
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the cyclone in Texas, he added: "This challenge is complicated and is exacerbated, considering that it is sweeping through an area that is the area most affected by Covid-19 in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to the Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the Corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to be cautious.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "we've gotten used to", such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have also been provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, Corona should be tested in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With winds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, according to authorities, "Hanna" made landfall on the island of Padre Island just off the Texas coast.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal stretch from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown while "Hanna" moved further inland and headed towards northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane "Douglas" was heading for Hawaii during the night to Sunday with winds of around 150 kilometres per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it is expected to be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average hurricane season this year, according to a May forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are expected, of which up to six could become very strong cyclones, the authority said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great magnitude.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, that of a below-average season is only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: Us President Donald Trump wrote via Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals stripped: Video assistant "punished" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic were stripped of two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Napoli - Four goals scored, four goals stripped: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a raven-black evening at 0-2 (0-1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the referee's video assistant.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: A festival of not given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR acted so hard against a team, "commented the" Corriere dello Sport. "
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Napoli had taken the lead by a goal from outside defender Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, in the 32nd minute Filip Djuricic initially cheered the equaliser.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) withdrew the hit due to an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - the VAR intervened again.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The referee team also withdrew the goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) according to the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In the injury time, Allan made the 2-0 final score for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets records, writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport."
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for double winners FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well" after a short holiday and a few days of training, has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes of action behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to his left foot root and threatens to be missing in decisive premier class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In the Munich Schmuddelwetter, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the course with a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: An appearance in the round-of-16 second leg against Chelsea FC on 8 August should be difficult, and the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: But Bayern do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: Flick mentioned in his personal triple formula the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration will be shown by his victory-hungry title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the premier class final on August 23rd.
wn.de.700404.11: We simply mastered the mandatory tasks with championship and cup very well.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it's time to create something special", said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich team can deal specifically with the final tournament and previously a training camp in the Algarve, the round-of-16 obligation against Chelsea FC is scheduled.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3: 0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become a Bayern nightmare again in the home arena as in the lost "final at home" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and recharge our trust with a good game, demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get in the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players on Säbener Straße, including the new players around noble shopping Leroy Sané, who met all new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Like all new ones, Leroy has fitted in well", reported Flick.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer just allowed to train, Flick much preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, team strength is now being trained for the Londoners, who, in contrast to the Flick ensemble, are in the playing rhythm.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, the Munich team could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-finals Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A way to the final in Lisbon "is not so easy", said the head coach, who from Tuesday on can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record goalscorer Klose and Flick know from many joint tournament preparations what is particularly important in the 0-to-100 mood.
wn.de.700404.26: With his current team, working is "a pleasure", praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: "Focus on winning" is an impressive characteristic of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including the willing to emigrate Thiago and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts are not assured beyond the premier class season.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula One needs a special rule to choose its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Racing calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten Grand Prix confirmed so far, three more race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the race will take place at the Nürburgring in Germany and Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On November 1st, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will compete for World Championship points on the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: As it stands, the 2020 racing calendar comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are delighted that we continue to make great progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season", said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula One wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar will be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: Before the already officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December, according to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could still take place at the end of November.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: The regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the world championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents will be driven, there will be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles, citing "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming season.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent later this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula One will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races will not take place in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We're looking forward to being back with them next season", explained Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races was met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for this", said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The number of infections in the São Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: Moreover, the concerns of some teams about not wanting to drive in Brazil would not justify rejection.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known latenight show via video switch and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US latenight show via video switch.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her struggle against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil gaze" during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known latenight show about her plans for the future and her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me", she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to direct the focus away from the climate crisis" has shocked her.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: She has experienced everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children are taking to the streets.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She finds heads of state and leading politicians who scoff at her on social media or even try to silence her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was approached about a well-known scene in which she took a bitterly evil look at US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN Climate Summit in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was captured by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, an animated image, which ultimately became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: In response to Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she answered only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I think that doesn't need any further explanation."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert probably did not expect the quick-witted answer and briefly disappeared from the picture laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" Speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmund real estate with a three-pack for Lazio Rome
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on par with Bavaria's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Shoe.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: The former Dortmund Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming the top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB professional scored three goals in Lazio Rome's 5-1 (1-1) victory at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in the injury times of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: This means that the 30-year-old from fourth place in the table two games of the season before the end now has 34 goals of the season on his account - Robert Lewandowski of FC Bayern Munich scored just as many in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy, Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar faced Sampdoria Genoa with the leader in the evening.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: After a rapid climb with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Brilliant guitarist, drug junkie, cult fan: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday that a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians like Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green formed the now legendary band in London in 1967. His dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" is still unforgotten.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: Green experienced a rapid rise with Fleetwood Mac - but the band celebrated their greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all of the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Three years after its founding, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.15: This was followed by a social decline.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have temporarily lived on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in the London district of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: Already at a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned the first guitar handles.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager started playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Shortly afterwards he was hired as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton with the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the middle of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross" composed by Green gave the group its first number 1 hit in the winter of 1968 / 69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype and his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that happened to me in life is drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit."
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at the time of a rock star returning to Earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free from drugs, Green released some albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band broke up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts he was a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his soft sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
